page.title: 13Entertainment
page.content: Penyffordd playgroup opens every day except Wednesday when there is a mother and toddler group when they are 2 years , 9 months old. The local pub is the Millstone which is one hundred years old.People of various ages go to listen to the Jukebox and to play Snooker. For the older generation there is a British Legion.This opened in 1956.It has disco'shows,dominoes,pool and a drinking area.In Penymynydd the local public house is the White Lion Inn.It was built in 1843 when it used to be a small estate owned by Mrs.Jane Hough. The land around the pub was once a farm and is still working now.In the summer it is crowded.Foreignors visit the pub as well as the regulars.The inside of the pub is very historic. By S Braid,E Rogers,S Blythe,N Lloyd, P Withoughby.
